Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-8869 affecting package python-pip for versions less than 24.2-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-8869 affecting package python-pip for versions less than 24.2-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-pip is earlier than 24.2-4, affected by CVE-2025-8869
